PropertyValue.Value: select * from(select t.station_id,t.line_id,t.device_id,t.update_date||t.update_time as updatetime,st.css_status_id,st.css_status_id_name,st.css_status_value_name,t.update_date,t.update_time from dev_run_status_detail t left join basi_status_id_info st on t.status_id= st.css_status_id and t.status_value = st.css_status_value inner join BASI_DEV_STATUS_SHOW_CFG_INFO bdsci on bdsci.css_status_id=st.css_status_id and bdsci.dev_type_class=subStr(t.device_id,5,2))
